docs.snippet: After failed attempts with three N.F.L. teams and three years away from the league, Danny Lansanah has been trying to chase his football dream and play for the Jets....
docs.lead_paragraph: After failed attempts with three N.F.L. teams and three years away from the league, Danny Lansanah has been trying to chase his football dream and play for the Jets.
docs.abstract: Profile of Danny Lansanah, linebacker vying for a spot on the New York Jets; Lansanah counsels teenagers at Alternative Rehabilitation Communities in his hometown of Harrisburg, Pa, urging them to follow their dreams no matter how much adversity they encounter.

headline.main: Life Advice for Youth Resurfaces for a Jet
headline.print_headline: Life Advice For Youth Resurfaces For a Jet

docs.snippet: Bare essentials and clear plastic bags are the norm at N.F.L. games this season under new rules that were put in place after the Boston Marathon bombings in April....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bare essentials and clear plastic bags are the norm at N.F.L. games this season under new rules that were put in place after the Boston Marathon bombings in April.
docs.abstract: NFL's stricter bag policy, put in place after Boston Marathon bombings in April, generally allows fans to carry only small purses, one-gallon freezer bags and clear plastic bags into stadiums; shoulder bags, backpacks, fanny packs and even diaper bags are now forbidden as league tries to reduce threats.

headline.main: N.F.L. Fans Met by Tighter Bag Policy
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Fans Met by Tighter Bag Policy

docs.snippet: Justin Pugh was moved from second-string left tackle to starting right tackle at practice, one of a series of moves the Giants made after an injury to center David Baas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justin Pugh was moved from second-string left tackle to starting right tackle at practice, one of a series of moves the Giants made after an injury to center David Baas.
docs.abstract: New York Giants move Justin Pugh from second-string left tackle to starting right tackle during practice; is one of a series of moves following the switch of left guard Kevin Boothe, who has played center before, to take over for injured David Bass.

docs.lead_paragraph: Denver has lost Von Miller, its best defensive player, until October. The N.F.L. found Miller in violation of its substance-abuse policy.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL suspends Denver Broncos linebacker Von Miller six games for violating the league's drug policy; other football developments noted.

headline.print_headline: Miller Suspended Six Games For a Drug Policy Violation
